item.title: Auto skillcape giver problem
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

hey, im trying to get an auto skillcape giver and its not really working how i want it to. it will not give them automatically once you reach 99, it will only give them once you type another command for some reason OR just type ::

i have this for one of them:

if(playerLevel[0] == 99) {
for(int sk=2677;sk<=2679;sk++){
addItem(sk, 1);
}
}

whats wrong with it?

Read full topic
